long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a modern password generation tool designed to create strong and secure passwords. This app does not store any passwords. The passwords are generated on the client-side and are not transmitted or stored anywhere. However, it is important to follow good password management practices to enhance the security of your passwords.
